metadata.title: CVE-2024-36959 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: devicetree: fix refcount leak in pinctrl_dt_to_map()If we fail to allocate propname buffer, we need to drop the referencecount we just took. Because the pinctrl_dt_free_maps() includes thedroping operation, here we call it directly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
